title: Development and characterization of aVaccinium vitis-idaealiposomal gel for the treatment of atopic dermatitis.
abstract: In this study, a liposomal gel with anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, and antioxidant effects and improving atopic dermatitis (AD) was prepared usingVaccinium vitis-idaeapolyphenol as the main active ingredient, which is safe, effective, of stable quality and has anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial effects.
